title.narrative: Exploring future DRCY and ZRCS collaboration with a special focus in SHRH and SGV

description.narrative: The DRCY and Zimbabwe Red Cross Society want to use the preparatory study to strengthen our partnership and future collaboration as well as explore possibilities for implementing youth activities responding to the challenges found with regards to sexual and reproductive health and rights and gender based violence. The preparatory study will take place in January 2020 by when we will have been working together on our current project for about one year. Hence, we want to use this opportunity to monitor, evaluate and develop our partnership and create a strong foundation for a partnership project from 2020. We wish to expand the partnerships scope and objectives with a partnership project focusing on sexual and reproductive health and rights and gender based violence and include youth leader deployment. We plan to include time for working on writing the partnership project and youth leader project together with ZRCS within DUFs guidelines during the trip.
